title: Text Editor
description: Built a text editor that has basic functionalities such as text formatting and image insertion.

title: Bomb Championship Game
description: Created a classic 2D two-player bomb game in which each player lays bombs on the field to eliminate the other.

title: South Pacific Programming Contest Practice
description: Practised solving coding problems and made preparation towards ACM-ICPC Divisional.

title: Account Management Application
description: Developed a desktop app that stores user account information and only allows authenticated user to access them.
